name: PENGUEMIC - Word Domination
blurb: When words become power and penguins rise up in arms, it's up to you to lead them to victory and declare global dominance. PC/Linux/iOS

rewards.reward: LITTLE PENGUIN \u2013 BACKER CREDIT + DIGITAL WALLPAPER + FULL-LENGTH ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK---\r\n\r\nSmall but spirited! For donating $5 and earning your status as one of these pint-sized powerhouses you get a free Penguemic digital wallpaper, the original soundtrack from the game and your name up on the website! Display your penguin pride for the world to see and blast these tunes to spice up your day!

ROCKHOPPER PENGUIN \u2013 COPY OF THE GAME + ALL ITEMS FROM LOWER TIERS---\r\nThe early bird gets the herring (and avoids the bear)! Secure yourself the Galapagos Penguin awards as well as a copy of the game itself! World domination waits for no bird, so why not make sure your path of destruction begins on release day? Onwards mighty Rockhoppers!

FIORDLAND PENGUIN \u2013 100 DIGITAL FLASHCARDS + ALL ITEMS FROM LOWER TIERS---Take your word domination into overtime. Fiordland Penguin donators get all the Rockhopper Penguin rewards and then take things a step further with 100 digital flashcards. Each flashcard contains words and their associated characters/spells from the game to allow you to study when you\u2019re not laying waste to your enemies.

MACARONI PENGUIN \u2013 T-SHIRT + POSTER + ALL ITEMS FROM LOWER TIERS---\r\n\tAh yes, the ever-stylish Macaroni penguin \u2013 truly you are as fly as a penguin gets my friend. For $35 you enjoy all the bounty from the Rockhopper Penguins and make it look just a little bit cooler with a sweet Penguemic t-shirt. Of course, there\u2019s no reason why you should be the only cool cat on the iceberg \u2013 bling out your room with a colorful Penguemic poster so all who enter know where your allegiances lie.

HUMBOLDT PENGUIN \u2013 50 PENGUEMIC COLLECTIBLE CARDS + PREMIUM POSTER + ALL ITEMS FROM LOWER TIERS---\r\n\tThink that poster the Macaroni\u2019s got was cool? Well just leave it to the Humboldts to upstage it. Humboldts still rock that all that other sick loot, but get a flashy new Premium poster as well as 50 commemorative Penguemic collectible cards. A true penguin leader would want to commemorate his victories, and what better way than with these glossy, full-color cards depicting characters and scenes from the game?

CHINSTRAP PENGUIN \u2013 100 PENGUEMIC COLLECTIBLE CARDS + SIGNED PREMIUM POSTER + ALL ITEMS FROM LOWER TIERS---\r\n\tTough, rugged, and hearty \u2013 with a name like \u201cChinstrap\u201d you KNOW these penguins mean business. Chinstrap Penguins aren\u2019t content with 50 collectible cards \u2013 they want 100. Sure that premium poster the Humboldt got is cool, but you know what\u2019d make it cooler? Having the entire dev team sign it just for you so everyone knows that you know people. Chinstrap Penguins says: \u201cYeah, that sounds great, give me that and all that other stuff you\u2019re handing out.\u201d We know better than to say no.

GENTOO PENGUIN \u2013 PICK A WORD + ALL ITEMS FROM LOWER TIERS---\r\n\tLove the game but can\u2019t believe they left your favorite word out? Think there\u2019s a word we forgot that would work perfectly? Well you must be a Gentoo Penguin, cause those guys are full of ideas and far be it from us to silence them. So sure, Mr/Ms. Gentoo, for a $250 donation you\u2019re more than welcome to give us a word that will be represented in the final build of the game.

ROYAL PENGUIN \u2013 DESIGN A CHARACTER + ALL UNRESTRICTED ITEMS FROM LOWER TIERS---\r\n\tWhile all this loot and the ability to suggest a word for the game might seem awesome to an average penguin, you scoff at such rewards. \u201cI could make this game a hundred times better than these filthy peasants\u201d you think to yourself. You\u2019re royalty, after all. Well fine then, clearly we cannot refuse. Work with our designers to help conceive of your own enemy/ally/spell to appear in the game.

KING PENGUIN \u2013 SKYPE MEET (1 HOUR) + ALL UNRESTRICTED ITEMS FROM LOWER TIERS---\r\n\tNow things are serious. You aren\u2019t some blue-collar Chinstrap or lowly Macaroni \u2013 you\u2019re the king baby. King Penguins deserve special treatment \u2013 like, say, a meeting with two team members of your choice to talk shop. Ask us anything you\u2019d like \u2013 want to know where the concepts come from? Wonder how someone goes about coding this stuff? Anything you could possibly want to know about building a game is yours for the asking. Hail to the king baby.

GALAPAGOS PENGUIN \u2013 BOOTCAMP (1 WEEK) + ALL UNRESTRICTED ITEMS FROM LOWER TIERS---\r\n\tThe rarest of all penguin species, you stand out from the rest. Your donations to the project have earned you an equally rare opportunity \u2013 we fly you our to our gamer house in San Diego for an intensive week-long game design bootcamp. Get exposure to all aspects of game design \u2013 from concept development to illustration, coding, animating, and finalizing. By the end of the week you will have a working prototype of your very own game and unrivaled experience to take with you.

EMPEROR PENGUIN \u2013 PERSONALIZED GAME (1 WEEK DEV CYCLE) + ALL ITEMS FROM LOWER TIERS---\r\n\tEver had an awesome idea for a small-scale game but never had the skills or resources to make it a reality? What if you could just get a talented team together, say, ours for example, and have them do it for you? Well you\u2019re the Emperor now and emperor\u2019s get what they want. You supply the concept, we\u2019ll supply the game. It\u2019s that simple.
